Functions/Subroutines

initial Module Reference

Module which contains all the routines/call to routines which setup and restart the code. Initial conditions for filament set in run.in for more information on the options see Initial condition for filament. More...

Functions/Subroutines

subroutine init_setup ()
 Prints and sets up intial conditions - will give warnings/errors if there are any conflicting options set in run.in.
subroutine data_restore
 restart the code code periodically writes all the main variables to a file ./data/dump.dat, if this is detected at startup then the code will restart from that data file
subroutine setup_single_loop
 set up a single loop in the x-y plane, it's size is dictated by the initial number of particles set and the size of
subroutine setup_single_line
 set up a single line from -z to z, number of particles is automatically adjusted to box size and
subroutine setup_cardoid
 draw cardoid (http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cardioid) in the x-y plane
subroutine setup_leap_frog
 two loops in the x-y plane their sizes are dictated by the initial number of particles set and the size of
subroutine setup_crow
 anti parallel lines from -z to z which drives the crow instability particle count automatically adjusted
subroutine setup_linked_filaments
 two linked loops which drive a reconnection
subroutine setup_colliding_loops
 two unlinked loops which move towards each other driving a reconnection
subroutine setup_kivotedes
 four unlinked loops as in Kivotedes 2001, PRL
subroutine setup_wave_loop
 clustered loops, helical/planar waves added with specific spectrum all set in run.in
subroutine setup_linked_wave_loop
 linked loops, helical/planar waves added with specific spectrum all set in run.in
subroutine setup_wave_line
 lines from the lop of the box to the bottom, helical/planar waves added with specific spectrum all set in run.in
subroutine setup_random_loops
subroutine setup_tangle

subroutine setup_mesh

Detailed Description

Module which contains all the routines/call to routines which setup and restart the code. Initial conditions for filament set in run.in for more information on the options see Initial condition for filament.
